QuestData.Title: Spirit of the Loch
QuestData.Description: I have no knowledge of any artifact that Cho'gall is crafting, but I think I know one that can help.$B$BCountess Verrall is the ancient spirit of Loch Verrall to the north. She has no love for the Twilight's Hammer, who have polluted her waters.$B$BSeek her for the wisdom that you seek.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Countess Verrall at Loch Verrall in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: I know why you are here, $n. Your reasons sing within your fluids.$B$BI know about the dead dwarf forgesmith polluting my lake. If you want to find out what his corpse remembers, you must earn it.
